border-default.comment: Usually used for low emphasis borders and espacially divider elements.

border-default-subdued.comment: Usually used for high emphasis borders.

border-critical.comment: Usally used as an border on critical components.

border-success.comment: Usally used as an border on success components.

border-on-highlight.comment: Used as border color on containers that need to be highlighted (e.g. form fields).

focus.comment: Used as color for the focus state of all elements
